import React, { useState } from 'react' function CreateUser() { const [name, setName] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [age, setAge] = useState() const Submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:3001/createUser", {name, email, age}) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

setName(e.target.value)}/>
setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
setAge(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default CreateUser
